sentences.english: Life seemed a strained Yuen, the moment must not relax.
sentences.chinese: 生活彷彿一根緊繃的玄，一刻放鬆不得。

sentences.english: The Americans stayed here from June to September.
sentences.chinese: 那些好國人從六月到玄月皆呆正在那邊。

sentences.english: The xuan President let enterprise separate kylin daredevil to go abroad.
sentences.chinese: 玄會長讓振國分開麒麟藝高去留學。

sentences.english: I've a better question. Who is in the septic tank?
sentences.chinese: 我有個更玄的問題化糞池裏是誰？

sentences.english: One of the girls was named Xuan, who had the best grade in art subjects in the class.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個女孩叫玄，是我們班文科成績最好的女生。

sentences.english: He was a favourite of the Emperor Xuanzong and became the official poet of the Imperial family.
sentences.chinese: 玄宗皇帝非常欣賞他，於是他成爲了皇家的官方詩人。

sentences.english: In the Ranger area highly chloritic rocks were believed to be altered dolerites.
sentences.chinese: 蘭傑地區的強烈綠泥石化岩石據信可能是蝕變粒玄巖。
